name: Large Drake
languages: Giant Eagle, understands Common and Auran but can't speak them

trait.name: Keen Sight
text: The drake has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The drake makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
